summary: Simple retxture of Gimora\'s Berserk Sonia Armor
descriptionHtml:
Berserk Sonia Armor Retexture by Tru3Magic
Original Mod Author - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6550312]Gimora[/url]

--------------------------------------------------------
Description:

Simple retexture (replaced metal texture and altered cloth parts, helmet not included).
Comes in three versions:
- Red, original like.
- Dark blue/Black, brigandine style.

Mod is updated to 1.1:

- Optional Chainmail Skirt version(for both colors)

Critique, suggestions and advice is always welcome!

Don\'t forget to endorse if you like it!

Enjoy! :)

--------------------------------------------------------
Installation:

Download and install Gimora\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34727]Berserk Sonia Armor for UNP[/url]

Then install mine retexture and confirm overwriting

--------------------------------------------------------
Uninstallation:

Uninstall using NMM

Or delete the files in

Skyrim/Data/Textures/Armor/Sonia Armor/

--------------------------------------------------------
Credits:

Gimora - For his great armor

NYCBicycleClub - For feedback and idea.

dimon99 - For UNP body

Bethesda - Skyrim
 --------------------------------------------------------
My other mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34306]Tru3Magics Light Elven Armor Retexture[/url]
author: Tru3Magic
